thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text: I purchased Guild Wars 2, and I wasn't expecting so much verification. Just to get the order through, and paying using PayPal, I had to give a verification key from my PayPal email, and then a verification from my phone. Neither of which went very smoothly, as my email is already 2-factor authentication, and same with PayPal. I understand the security aspect, but at the same time, this was rougher than using Amazon. There is a reason why companies like Amazon and Apple have humans to review orders, and why sometimes they're delayed for up to two hours.
